meanings.sent1: The ichnolite of the dinosaur was preserved in the rock.
meanings.sent2: I found an ichnolite of a prehistoric creature while hiking.
meanings.sent3: The ichnolite in the mud looked like a tiny time capsule.
meanings.sent4: The ichnolite of ancient life tells a story of the past.
meanings.sent5: The ichnolite was a clear imprint of the animal's foot.

meanings.definition: A trace or mark left by an organism.
meanings.sent1: The ichnolite of the snail was visible on the leaf.
meanings.sent2: The ichnolite left by the rabbit showed its path through the garden.
meanings.sent3: Finding an ichnolite in the sand was like discovering a secret message.
meanings.sent4: The ichnolite of the bird's beak was etched in the soft clay.
meanings.sent5: The ichnolite left behind by the squirrel was a clue to its whereabouts.
